definition[0]: a university degree in a science subject that you can get after your first degree
definition[1]: Multimedia Super Corridor; an area of Malaysia providing offices, telephone and computer links, and other things that are needed by IT companies
example[0]: The types of companies invited to the MSC include hardware and software vendors and R&D organisations.
definition[2]: Master of Science; a university degree in science that you can do after your first degree
